name: Island Designer
description:
Use this procedurally generated island designer to create your dream island using various tools. Use the paint tool to color the landscape, object tool to decorate and create beautiful scenery and the foliage tool to cover it in luscious greens.

This game was made for the Finally Finish Something Jam 2021.

Controls

WASDMovementRight click and move mouseCamera movementLeft ClickUse selected tool/InteractSpaceAscendShiftDescendScroll wheelZoom in/out
